data.text: «Niizu, Zɔɓe, woilo dɛɛ kìsu vaiti ma,
Wɛlɛ, nà laalaosu,
Zìi ná-sɔledai ɠa nà-kpɔɛiti ti ɠulazu su.
GALA Zɛnvui ɠa é kpɛ̀tɛai,
Ni ɗa zoo, gòoɠaaʋote,
GALA gaazu, nà ga è ɠɛʋele,
Naazu è la ɓalia ga dualuagi nɔ̀un gaazu,
«È boni, é loo gòizu,
‹Ɲàdegɛ, tɔ koloɠolo ge la bà.
Anɛɛ naa ʋe, GALA ka faiti kpɛtɛzu dàalɔɠɔma,
É kɔlui ʋiliga kɔ̀ɠɔiti ba,
«Nà è wooɠaaʋotesu ga, gaama la è ya naa zu,
Leeni vaa zu è pɔ è tɔun maaɠaali,
Anɛɛ naa ʋe, GALA ka ɗa ɓɔɛ,
Toɠa ɗa ɓɔɛ ga segi ta kulakɛlɛmai kpidii,
Názu ɠa a ɗa kulakɛlɛmai ɠɛ la nuiti bɛ,
nii a kɛ é nuɓusɛi zeɠe ná-kɛɛwotiiti polu,
Zekana é ti-yɛnvui ɠizosu da kabai ma,
«Nui ɠa ɗa yɛ daazuʋɛ ga taɓai maaʋele, é ɠigi zɔlɔɔ, é lɛnɛ,
Naazu ɓului ɠa ɗa ɲɔu da,
Kɔlɔgi ɠula ma, é ɠaɲa, nu ɠaazulosu la ba,
É maaɓuɠaa kabai ʋa.
Kɛlɛ ni GALA ná-geezuɠeelai gila ga ɠɛna zunui naa ɠoba,
naazu toɠa zaalai la ma, é maawɔinɠa, é ɠɛ GALA ma:
názu ɠa kpusɛi niinɛzu la eɠɛ ná-doungo ziɛgi zu,
Toɠa wooɠula GALA ma, naa yeezei bu ga pagɔ,
Toɠa too ga guyei ɛsɛ pɛ gaazu, é ɠɛ ma:
GALA ge kùlani kabai zu,
Pɛtɛ, GALA ka naa kpein kɛɛzu nui ʋɛ,
nii a kɛ é zɛnvui ɠula ʋolu kabai zu,
Lo dɛɛ, Zɔɓe, woilo gòoi ma!
Anɛɛ naa ʋe, ni gooɠaaʋote ka è ya, bo,
Ni faa la è-la, è ʋa bo, maaɠɛ kpɔ,
